about_the_game:
C21 Steel Battle Chronicles is an Action MMORPG in which you can customize your very own robot to determine how it fights in battle.

The more you play, the more parts you can earn and incorporate into your own unique robot, unlocking further customization and enhancement options to utilize as you explore new planets and areas.

With so much freedom in customizing your robot, the possibilties are limitless! C21 Steel Battle Chronicles proudly delivers a diverse suite of customization options that are unrivaled by any other online game.

Now, become a member of the Neo Angel Force and defeat the nefarious Demon Force to restore peace to the Cosmic Renaissance!
detailed_description:
C21 Steel Battle Chronicles is an Action MMORPG in which you can customize your very own robot to determine how it fights in battle.

The more you play, the more parts you can earn and incorporate into your own unique robot, unlocking further customization and enhancement options to utilize as you explore new planets and areas.

With so much freedom in customizing your robot, the possibilties are limitless! C21 Steel Battle Chronicles proudly delivers a diverse suite of customization options that are unrivaled by any other online game.

Now, become a member of the Neo Angel Force and defeat the nefarious Demon Force to restore peace to the Cosmic Renaissance!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11 - 10.14
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 64MB
  • Storage: 1.2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 - 10.14
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB
  • Storage: 1.2 GB available space

name: 鋼鉄戦記C21

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 1.6GHｚ
  • Memory: 640 MB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 64MB, NVIDIA GeForce4, ATI RADEON 8500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1.2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0 and above)
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6300
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB, NVIDIA GeForce 9600, ATI Radeon HD 2900
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1.2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0 and above)
  • Additional Notes:
